frontmatter.title: proportional area chart with circle packing

examples.title: All 786 Known Planets to Scale
examples.author: xkcd
examples.note: This proportional area chart uses circle packing to show all 786 extrasolar planets (as of june 2012). Planets are categorized based on their mass which is shown with different color.
